## Data Processing

### Function for Steps 1 and 2

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
readData <- function(filepath, columns= "!area_name & !STCOU") {
  data2 <- read.csv(filepath)
  filterdata <- select(data2, c(area_name = "Area_name", "STCOU"), ends_with("D"))
  print(head(filterdata, 5))
  long_data <- pivot_longer(filterdata, cols = (!area_name & !STCOU), names_to = "enrollment", values_to = "value")
  print(head(long_data, 5))
}
```

```{r}
readData("./data/EDU01b.csv")
```
